unknownError.title: Unexpected Error
unknownError.message: Something went wrong. Please try again later or contact support if the issue persists.

invalidInput.title: Invalid Input
invalidInput.message: The input provided is not valid. Please check and try again.

missingData.title: Missing Data
missingData.message: Required data is missing. Please provide all necessary information and retry.

unauthorizedAccess.title: Unauthorized Access
unauthorizedAccess.message: You do not have permission to access this resource. Please check your credentials.

sessionExpired.title: Session Expired
sessionExpired.message: Your session has expired. Please log in again to continue.

nodeLimitExceeded.title: Node Limit Reached
nodeLimitExceeded.message: You have exceeded the maximum number of nodes allowed by your subscription. Upgrade to add more nodes.

paymentFailure.title: Payment Failed
paymentFailure.message: We couldn't process your payment. Please check your payment method and try again.

resourceUnavailable.title: Resource Unavailable
resourceUnavailable.message: The requested resource is currently unavailable. Please try again later.

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.message: The request timed out. Please check your network connection and try again.

dependencyFailure.title: System Dependency Error
dependencyFailure.message: A required system component is unavailable. Please contact support.

shardValidationFailed.title: Shard Validation Failed
shardValidationFailed.message: The shard integrity validation did not pass. Please verify the data and try again.

contractValidationFailed.title: Smart Contract Validation Error
contractValidationFailed.message: The smart contract contains errors. Please review and fix the issues before deploying.

contactSupport.title: Need Assistance?
contactSupport.message: If you need further help, contact our support team at support@atomic.ca or call +1-800-555-ATOMIC.
